io.netty.handler.codec.dns

Class DnsQueryHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.codec.dns.DnsHeader
      • io.netty.handler.codec.dns.DnsQueryHeader

  • public final class DnsQueryHeader
extends DnsHeader
    The DNS query header class which is used to represent the 12 byte header in a DnsQuery.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class io.netty.handler.codec.dns.DnsHeader

        OPCODE_IQUERY, OPCODE_QUERY, TYPE_QUERY, TYPE_RESPONSE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor for a DNS packet query header.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DnsQueryHeader

        public DnsQueryHeader(DnsMessage parent,
              int id)
        Constructor for a DNS packet query header. The id is user generated and will be replicated in the response packet by the server.
        Parameters:
        parent - the DnsMessage this header belongs to
        id - a 2 bit unsigned identification number for this query

    • Method Detail

      • type

        public int type()
        Returns the DnsMessage type. This will always return TYPE_QUERY.
        Overrides:
        type in class DnsHeader
        See Also:
        DnsHeader.TYPE_QUERY

        Sets the DnsHeader type. Must be TYPE_RESPONSE.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the header to allow method chaining

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

      • setZ

        public DnsQueryHeader setZ(int z)
        Description copied from class: DnsHeader
        Sets the field Z. This field is reserved and should remain as 0 if the DNS server does not make usage of this field.
        Overrides:
        setZ in class DnsHeader
        Parameters:
        z - the value for the reserved field Z
